entry.title: WIND WARNING , Sandspit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM PST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sandspit Airport 08:50 AM PST Sunday 01 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 6.8°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 5.6°C
Wind: SSE 65 km/h gust 84 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Rain beginning this afternoon. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections this afternoon. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 30%
